publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2404Robert Brown:Summer Academy at Strathclyde 2008—That the Parliament congratulates the University of Strathclyde on achieving 10 years of the Summer Academy at Strathclyde; notes that, during that time, 9,000 school students have been given a two-week taster of university life through the academy project and been provided with challenging and widening experiences that increase their motivation for learning; is grateful to the academy team, headed by their Director, Christine Percival, for their inspiration and dedication and to the 470 mentors who have given life to the project; welcomes the support of the 135 schools who have backed the academy, and urges schools and local authorities in west central Scotland to continue to fully support the venture. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Patrick Harvie*, David Whitton*, Jim Tolson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Charlie Gordon*, Bob Doris*, Ross Finnie*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jackie Baillie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Butler*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Robin Harper*
S3M-2404 Summer Academy at Strathclyde 2008 (lodged on 18 August 2008) Hugh O’Donnell*
